target.generate: SCHEMA: person(ssn, surname, name, boss) cars(plate, model, owner) INSTANCE: person(ssn: "123", surname: "Bruce", name: "Wayne", boss: "Boss1") person(ssn: "321", surname: "Bruce", name: "Wayne", boss: "Boss2") person(ssn: "231", surname: "Bruce", name: "Wayne", boss: "Boss4") cars(plate: "BM321XS", model: "BatMobile", owner: "123")

scenario.dependencies:
ExtEGDs:
e1: person(ssn: $ssn1, surname: $surname, name: $name1, boss: $boss1), person(ssn: $ssn2, surname: $surname, name: $name2, boss: $boss2), cars(plate: $plate1, model: $model1, owner: $ssn1) and not exists (cars(plate: $plate2, model: $model2, owner: $ssn2)) -> $ssn1 == $ssn2.
